name: The Turn-Bound Mage
author: 정따블
content: &quotYou criminal bastard… Are you still not coming to your senses?!&quotAll I did was start the final difficulty of the game Abyss of the Labyrinth — and the next thing I knew, I had possessed a game character in another world.
